title: [BUG] Confusing logs from ShimLoader even if -DallowConventionalDistJar=true is set
body:
A user hit an issue where a spark-shell job couldn't find the mutable class loader in the executors. I used the `-DallowConventionalDistJar=true` option to make help them side step the issue, by disabling parallel worlds. This jar works and it loads correctly, but I am seeing some messages from the shim loader that I think are just warnings (though I am not entirely sure). It would be nice to remove these messages if we know see `-DallowConventionalDistJar=true`, if the ShimLoader is not expected to be active...

```
10/20 14:40:49 INFO ShimLoader: findURLClassLoader hit the Boostrap classloader org.apache.spark.executor.ExecutorClassLoader@639d5c5b, failed to find a mutable classloader!
23/10/20 14:40:49 WARN ShimLoader: Found an unexpected context classloader org.apache.spark.executor.ExecutorClassLoader@639d5c5b. We will try to recover from this, but it may cause class loading problems.
23/10/20 14:40:54 INFO RapidsPluginUtils: RAPIDS Accelerator build: {version=23.10.0-SNAPSHOT, user=abellina, url=https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids.git, date=2023-10-20T14:35:39Z, revision=1baa350ec2289eac84287676f2b76b7e4e82013d, cudf_version=23.10.0, branch=branch-23.10}
23/10/20 14:40:54 INFO RapidsPluginUtils: RAPIDS Accelerator JNI build: {version=23.10.0, user=, url=https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids-jni.git, date=2023-10-12T02:48:23Z, revision=e5fb14eb4bd4087be9b5a7e960edb27fc76ffc2d, branch=HEAD}
23/10/20 14:40:54 INFO RapidsPluginUtils: cudf build: {version=23.10.0, user=, url=https://github.com/rapidsai/cudf.git, date=2023-10-12T02:48:23Z, revision=9f0c2f452f1cf318c3f7fe2c6f7e07fc513fc335, branch=HEAD}
23/10/20 14:40:54 WARN RapidsPluginUtils: RAPIDS Accelerator 23.10.0-SNAPSHOT using cudf 23.10.0.
23/10/20 14:40:54 INFO RapidsPluginUtils: Estimated number of cores is 12
```
